janus¶

janus.driver This is the qmmm driver module
janus.system
janus.initializer

driver¶

This is the qmmm driver module

janus.driver.run_janus(filename='input.json')¶
janus.driver.run_simulation(initializer, restart)¶

Drives QM/MM with MD time step integration

Parameters:equilibrate (int) – number of steps to run MD steps before QM/MM, default is 5000
janus.driver.run_single_point(initializer)¶

Drives single QM/MM computation

Parameters:filename (str) – contains the filename of the input file, default is ‘input.json’

system¶

class janus.system.System(qm_indices, qm_residues, run_ID, partition_ID='qm')¶

Bases: object

A system class that stores system information such as energy, forces, and positions for each region of a system at a particular point Stores qmmm and aqmmm information as well.

compute_scale_factor_g(mm, link) Computes scale factor g for link atom, RC, and RCD schemes.

Attributes

compute_scale_factor_g(mm, link)¶

Computes scale factor g for link atom, RC, and RCD schemes.

Note

r given in pmm but don’t need to convert because it is a ratio need functionality for link atoms != ‘H’

Parameters:
  • qm (str) – element symbol of the QM atom involved in broken bond
  • mm (str) – element symbol of the MM atom involved in broken bond
  • link (str) – element symbol for link atom
Returns:

g, the scaling factor
Return type:

float
class janus.system.Buffer(ID)¶

Bases: object

A class to store information for buffer groups from aqmmm computations such as what atoms are contained in the buffer group, the switching function, COM coordinates, etc.

Attributes

Initializer¶

class janus.initializer.Initializer(param, as_file=True)¶

Bases: object

Class that initializes the initial parameters and necessary wrapppers

initialize_wrappers([simulation, restart]) Instantiates qm, mm, qmmm, and/or aqmmm wrapper objects used for computation based on input parameters
load_param(filename) Converts a json file into a dictionary
update_param() updates default parameters with user defined parameters

Attributes

initialize_wrappers(simulation=False, restart=False)¶

Instantiates qm, mm, qmmm, and/or aqmmm wrapper objects used for computation based on input parameters

Returns:
  • MMWrapper object
  • QMMM wrapper object
load_param(filename)¶

Converts a json file into a dictionary

Parameters:filename (str) – name of json file
Returns:parameters contained in filename
Return type:dict
update_param()¶

updates default parameters with user defined parameters
